commands: sh -lc 'for d in . .. ../.. /workspace /app; do if [ -f "$d/package-lock.json" ]; then cd "$d" && npm ci --legacy-peer-deps && exit 0; fi; done; echo "No package-lock.json found"; exit 1'

sh -lc 'for d in . .. ../.. /workspace /app; do if [ -f "$d/package-lock.json" ]; then cd "$d" && npm run prisma:generate && npm run translate:compile && npm run build && exit 0; fi; done; echo "Could not locate repo root for build"; exit 1'

deploy.startCommand: sh -lc 'for d in . .. ../.. /workspace /app; do if [ -f "$d/package-lock.json" ]; then cd "$d" && npm run start; exit; fi; done; echo "Could not locate repo root for start"; exit 1'
